name: Raw Deal Online
short_description: Raw Deal Online is an client for playing Raw Deal online.  It is based off the CCG program Apprentice, but specifically for Raw Deal players.  It is usable in Linux, Mac, and Windows, and features support for a Backlash deck, as well as other RD features.
